meanings.definition: Not pleasing or appealing to the senses
meanings.sent1: The old, unattractive building stood out among the modern structures.
meanings.sent2: She felt unattractive in her outdated clothes.
meanings.sent3: The unattractive smell of the garbage made everyone cover their noses.
meanings.sent4: The unattractive truth about the situation was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The unattractive color combination made the room look dull and lifeless.

meanings.sent1: The plain, unattractive vase didn't match the elegant decor.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house had an unattractive appearance.
meanings.sent3: His unattractive attempt at humor fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent4: The unattractive reality of the situation hit her hard.
meanings.sent5: The unattractive landscape failed to capture the artist's attention.

meanings.sent1: The unattractive smell coming from the dumpster made her gag.
meanings.sent2: The creepy crawlies in the dark corner were unattractive to look at.
meanings.sent3: The unattractive taste of the medicine made him cringe.
meanings.sent4: The unattractive behavior of the bully made others avoid him.
meanings.sent5: The unattractive sight of the decaying fruit turned her stomach.
